title: Focus by Cabana Labs
name: focus
description: Focus breaks bad habits by taking you to a beautiful page whenever you type in your favorite distracting websites.
author: Cabana Labs

preferences.name: defaultWebsite
preferences.title: Default Webpage
preferences.description: Focus will redirect to this page whenever you try to visit a blocked website.

preferences.name: officeHours
preferences.title: Set office hours?
preferences.description: Turning on office hours will let you limit your breaks to around 7 minutes each time you switch the plugin Off during office hours.
